thread.title: Lava launches Iris Fuel F1 Mini, priced at Rs 4,399
thread.title_full: Lava launches Iris Fuel F1 Mini, priced at Rs 4,399 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Lava launches Iris Fuel F1 Mini, priced at Rs 4,399
text:
NEW DELHI: Lava has expanded its Iris range of smartphones with the addition of Iris Fuel F1 Mini. Listed on the company's website, the smartphone sports a price tag of Rs 4,399. Iris Fuel F1 Mini is a dual-sim smartphone with a 4-inch (480x800p) WVGA display. It measures 125.5x63.4x10.85mm and weighs 120gm. 

The smartphone running on Android 4.4.2 KitKat is powered by a 1GHz single-core processor with 512MB of RAM. 

The latest Lava smartphone sports 8GB of inbuilt storage, which is further expandable via microSD card (up to 32GB). On camera front, there's a 5MP rear camera with LED flash, face recognition, Panorama and geo tagging. The secondary camera is 0.3MP camera. 

Iris Fuel F1 Mini packs a 2,000mAh battery. The company claims 157 hours standby time and 19 hours of talk time. 

The connectivity options in the phone include 3G, GPRS/ EDGE, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, micro-USB and Bluetooth options. The handset is listed in Black and White colours. 

The smartphone will compete with the likes of Micromax Canvas Spark 2, Yu Yunique, Xolo Era and Lava Iris X1 Selfie. General 2G Network GSM: 900/1800 Mhz 3G Network WCDMA: 2100 Mhz SIM Dual-sim Dimensions 125.5mm X 63.4mm X 10.85mm Weight 120g Display Size 4-inch Type WVGA Display Memory Card Slot up to 32GB Internal 8GB, 512MB Data GPRS Yes EDGE Yes Bluetooth Yes Camera Primary 5MP Secondary 0.3MP Features OS Android KitKat v4.4.2 CPU 1 GHz Processor Browser HTML5 Battery Battery Capacity 2,000mAh
